name: Alien Blitz
overview: Alien Blitz is a simple space shooter for the Commodore 64. It was developed by Simon Jones using G-Pascal and published in Australian Commodore Review 1984/06. Game description: A single alien flies down the screen at a time. The player has to shoot and kill the aliens as they advance. The alien increases in speed as the game progresses, which increases the challenge. The alien itself does not actually shoot. If the alien touches the player's ship or the bottom of the screen, the game is over. Uses simple black and white graphics
